name: 蔚蓝月下 Sapphire Moon - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
It's the Soundtrack of Sapphire Moon , in WAV format.

演唱：@雪霏岚岚
作曲：踏云社
作词：星愿制作组
PV：麻薯印象

whiisky

风入松

08 The day after yesterday

12 The sunshine on the beach
13 The twilight tide
14 They had a wonderful time
